content: snowstar socks cosy socks with a touch of fluff for late winter with spring on the way by liza levchuk materials yarn sport weight approx 350 - 400 yards sample sock knit in briggs & little durasport in oatmeal main color blue and grey and plassard melodie in white needles set of 2 5 mm/us size 1 5 double pins or circular needles or size needed to obtain gauge although this pattern is written for double pins cuff-down it can be worked on circular needles and toe-up gauge sport weight yarn 24 sts per 4 inches 10 cm fingering weight yarn 36 sts per 4 inches abbreviations co cast on sts stitches k knit cc1 contrast color 1 k2tog knit 2 stitches together cc2 contrast color 2 ktbl knit through the back loop cc3 contrast color 3 pu pick up mc main color sl 1 slip one stitch as if to purl dpns double pins ssk slip slip then knit the 2 slipped stitches rs right side outside-facing side together st st stockinette stitch ws wrong side inside-facing side instructions cuff with cc1 co 64 sts and divide over double pins while working *ki p1* rib join for knitting in the round and work *k1 p1* rib another round with cc1 change to mc or optionally cc1 and work another 12 rounds for 14 rounds total or longer if you like if you re using cc1 change to mc work 2 rounds st st leg chart work 15 rounds of the leg chart leg work 3 rounds in st st work 22 rounds in *k7 p1* rib heel flap the heel is worked on 32 sts x 33 rounds round 1 with the rs facing work in *k7 p1* across the first 32 sts round 2 turn your work and with the ws facing *k 1 p7* repeat rounds 1 & 2 another 16 times ending with round 1 heel turn with ws facing you setup round sl 1 p 16 p2tog p1 turn round 1 sl 1 k3 ssk k1 turn round 2 sl 1 p4 p2tog p1 turn round 3 sl 1 k5 ssk k1 turn round 4 sl 1 p6 p2tog p1 turn round 5 sl 1 k7 ssk k1 turn continue this until you ve knit all the sts there are now 18 sts on the needle gusset to pick up pu the heel flap sts with a dpn needle pu 15 sts along the heel flap and pu 1 extra st between the heel flap and the instep knit these through the back loop ktbl work across the 32 instep sts in *k7 p1* pattern with a dpn needle pu 1 extra st between the instep and the heel flap and pu 15 heel flap sts knit these ktbl and k across half of the heel sts 9 sts you now have 25 sts on needle 1 32 sts on needle 2 the instep 25 sts on needle 3 decrease every second round by alternating
